meanings.definition: Not involving a contract or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The noncontracts agreement was simply a verbal understanding.
meanings.sent2: The noncontracts arrangement was based on trust.
meanings.sent3: The noncontracts deal was like a handshake agreement.
meanings.sent4: The noncontracts relationship was built on mutual respect.
meanings.sent5: The noncontracts partnership was informal but effective.

meanings.definition: To fail to enter into a contract or agreement.
meanings.sent1: They noncontracts when they couldn't agree on the terms.
meanings.sent2: She noncontracts with the company due to conflicting interests.
meanings.sent3: He noncontracts whenever the negotiations get too complicated.
meanings.sent4: The team noncontracts when the terms are unreasonable.
meanings.sent5: I noncontracts because the conditions were not favorable.
